<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post">
    <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <category display_value="OOB">7cb680be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcb37</category>
        <github_id>95</github_id>
        <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/95</github_url>
        <message>Use the following sample script to decrypt stored password.

```javascript
var gr = new GlideRecord("basic_auth_credentials");
gr.get("88533e992f5e201051dad5f62799b6cb");
var Encrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
var decryptedStringAsBase64 = Encrypter.decrypt(gr.password);
gs.log("Decoded string is " + decryptedStringAsBase64);
```</message>
        <number>TIL0001098</number>
        <status>old</status>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-04-12 10:00:23</sys_created_on>

        <title>Decrypt password</title>
